For those having the Xex CRC problem, I found a fix to get abgx to verify.

First, use abgx with level 3 autofix. Check all of the SS challenge boxes, and turn on "check for AnyDVD style game corruption"

abgx will do a AnyDVD style check, and will verify the CRC while doing it.

Next, run abgx again, same settings, but this time use AutoFix level 2. This tiem it will download the needed Xex.ini file and abgx will claim that all CRC's match and stealth has passed.
